name: Add new Service Provider Pro orders to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time there is a new order in Service Provider Pro, Make will automatically add this order to a Google Sheets spreadsheet as new row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10nODw2DmXjhhWH7Cgp1Swxrodxu5b_1dtr5KJWw2ZVs/edit?usp=sharing).
